Shuri and Kagura's announcement caused quite\na reaction, considering they were practically\nunknown before.%K%P
The spontaneous, unrehearsed way they spoke and\nargued with each other was well received.%K%P
'But... It's not working out\nquite as well as I thought.'%K%P
There'd definitely been a positive response. \nBut it wasn't enough to affect their popularity yet.%K%P
So far people seemed to appreciate\nthat it was a novel idea, but that was all.%K%P
If we didn't follow it up with some real updates\nthey could easily lose interest. With that in mind,\nI felt half expectant, half worried.%K%P
'Just getting this many comments\nmakes me glad.'%K%P
Unlike me, Shuri had really cheered up.%K%P
'The photos and videos I uploaded on my own\nwere never this popular.'%K%P
'Really?'%K%P
'No one takes that much interest in the lower-ranked\nidols. Only a few people comment here and there.'%K%P
'And I might be higher ranked than Shuri, but I still\ncan't compare with the girls in the upper half.'%K%P
'I see...'%K%P
As far as Shuri and Kagura were concerned, our\nopening move was already a success, even if the\neffect was less dramatic than I'd been hoping for.%K%P
I'd looked at the girls' individual photos and\nvideos, and they all had less than ten comments.%K%P
This video had already broken that record several\ntimes over. I could understand their excitement.%K%P
'We've managed to grab their attention. \nI think it's a good start, don't you?'%K%P
'Yeah! My only problem is that it looks like we're\ngoing to be called 'Shuri & Kagura (TBC)' after all.'%K%P
'The people have spoken.\nI agree with their judgment. Just accept it.'%K%P
By noon the comments gave Shuri a slight lead\nin the race for top billing.%K%P
So for today at least, they'd be going under the name\n'Shuri & Kagura (TBC)'.%K%P
'Why not start off with a little informal rehearsal?'%K%P
'Sounds good! \nAs leader of 'Shuri & Kagura (TBC), \nallow me to provide our equipment for rehearsals.'%K%P
'Argh this is so insulting!'%K%P
The name and leader of the duo was decided by public\nvote. I'd be tallying the results every day at noon,\nso the leader's reign only lasted for one day.%K%P
'Just wait, I'll come out on top tomorrow!'%K%P
'Whatever you say. Now let's get started!'%K%P
Refusing to rise to Kagura's bait, Shuri set up her\nequipment. It was the same stuff she always used\nfor her street performances.%K%P
'I'm all set, too. \nJust begin whenever you're ready.'%K%P
I'd been given the role of filming\nShuri & Kagura (TBC) during their practice session.%K%P
This time instead of filming on my phone I was\nusing a video camera I'd borrowed from my parents.%K%P
'You're familiar with L☆SEVEN's songs, right Kagura? \nDon't worry about the vocals for now.\nLet's just practice the steps.'%K%P
'Sure thing! \nI'll dance Sara's part, then!'%K%P
'I-in that case, I'll do my sister's part.'%K%P
After another three minutes of discussing technical\ndetails, the little meeting came to an end.%K%P
'Well, I'm glad all that's settled. \nStart the music!'%K%P
A light rhythmic intro started to flow from the\nspeaker. It was one of L☆SEVEN's songs,\none that even I knew.%K%P
Shuri and Kagura adjusted their positions\nand began to dance in time with the music.%K%P
As I watched, I got the feeling that they might\nmake a good team after all...\nFor the first few seconds.%K%P
'Ow!'%K%P
Shuri stepped on Kagura's foot.%K%P
'Don't get in my way!'%K%P
'Stop getting up in my space!'%K%P
'Quit waving your hands around so much! \nYou're going to put someone's eye out.'%K%P
'A real dance needs these big gestures.\nOtherwise the audience won't feel it.'%K%P
Even as they argued they continued to dance. \nMaybe it would've been a better idea to stop them. %K%P
'How about you both move a little more apart\nfor the moment?'%K%P
Both of them were getting in each other's way. \nThey had to move further and further apart until\nthey had enough space to dance without colliding.%K%P
But moving that far apart was\nthe worst thing a duo could do.%K%P
'Okay, that's enough.'%K%P
'What do you think? Rather impressive, aren't I?'%K%P
'Dance is my specialty. \nI think I did a better job than Shuri.'%K%P
'Sorry, but neither of you were any good. \nYou're supposed to be working together here,\nnot each doing your own thing.'%K%P
I gave the girls my honest opinion. \nLearning not to be afraid of bumping into each\nother was going to be an especially important point.%K%P
'Hmm...\nDancing with someone else is harder than I thought.'%K%P
'Perhaps that's because your style is so unique. \nOh! I don't mean it's weird or anything.\nIt's a good thing, I like your style.'%K%P
Shuri had a real knack for not provoking others\neven when she was criticizing them.%K%P
I guess she really was thinking\nseriously about the duo.%K%P
'Do you have any ideas, Shuri?'%K%P
'Maybe if Kagura can't match my style,\nI should try to match hers?'%K%P
'Really? You don't mind?'%K%P
'That would probably be the best way. \nAnd I have to admit, your flair for dance\nis better than mine.'%K%P
'Wow. Thanks. It makes me blush when you're so\nnice and honest like that. Hee hee.'%K%P
'But I have a condition! You'll have to follow me\nwhen it comes to the vocals. \nI'm rather confident in my singing skills.'%K%P
The girls managed to allocate their respective roles.%K%P
Kagura was in charge of dance steps,\nwhile Shuri would provide the main vocals.%K%P
'Okay, let's try it with the vocals this time.'%K%P
Back to practice. I hoped they'd do a little better\nnow they were on better terms.%K%P
'*huff* *huff* *huff*... How can you move like that?'%K%P
'Never mind me... Your singing's awesome! \nI'm starting to feel a little insecure...'%K%P
'You're not the only one. \nI'm starting to wonder if we can really do this.'%K%P
We repeated the same song several times,\npracticing both the steps and the lyrics.%K%P
Shuri and Kagura were totally exhausted.%K%P
'It's only the first day, you've still got plenty\nof time to improve. And you're more comfortable\nworking together now, right?'%K%P
'I guess so. At least we managed to work our roles.'%K%P
'If we had the same strengths we'd probably\nhave fought about it a lot more.'%K%P
'Yes, but I can't compete with your dancing, Kagura.'%K%P
'Yeah, and you're totally the better singer.\nI'm happy to give that to you.'%K%P
'Let's do our best as a duo from here on.'%K%P
Shuri held out her hand.%K%P
'You got it, partner. No one's gonna stop us.'%K%P
The two girls shook hands.%K%P
'Yamato, you're getting this, right?'%K%P
'Of course.'%K%P
'That's our cameraman! Never misses the good stuff!'%K%P
I gave them a thumbs up.%K%P
'There, it's done.'%K%P
I finished editing the video I'd taken today\nand uploaded it to the site.%K%P
It featured the rehearsal and a few of Shuri\nand Kagura's exchanges.\nI wondered what kind of response it'd get.%K%P
'Oh right, as for your current rankings...'%K%P
Shuri: 27th. Kagura: 30th. \nThey'd both improved a little.%K%P
The first video must have done its job,\nbut it was interesting how Shuri was higher\nthan Kagura now.%K%P
I was looking forward to finding out\nwhat the duo name would be tomorrow.%K%P
The next day as soon as I got up in the morning,\nI loaded up the audition site.%K%P
'Hmm, I guess this won't be that easy...'%K%P
I was full of anticipation as I checked the comments\nfor our new video, but unfortunately the response\nwas lukewarm.%K%P
The initial announcement may have been kind\nof sensational, but the rehearsal footage\njust highlighted the girls' inexperience.%K%P
'I guess giving it your best by itself is not enough to\npull in the fans.'%K%P
Of course, there were some genuinely\npositive comments.%K%P
But there were also plenty that were honest\nabout the flaws in Shuri and Kagura's performance.%K%P
Looks like my fears hadn't been unfounded after all. \nIt was time to shake things up a little.%K%P
'Aw yeah! I am way in the lead today! Take that!'%K%P

Shuri and I had dropped by the goddess cafe
to wait for Kagura to finish her shift.
As soon as we stepped inside she bounded
up to us to announce her news.%K%P
It went without saying that a new victor had been\ndecided in the ongoing battle for leadership\nof the duo.%K%P
'Is that any way to speak to a customer?'%K%P
'Heh heh. Customer shmustomer.\nI'm your superior today. Bow down before me!'%K%P
'Geez, can't you do something about her, Yamato?'%K%P
'Maybe I'll have a word with the manager...'%K%P
'Whoa, wait a minute! Really, I'm sorry! \nI won't get carried away again, please let it slide?'%K%P
Kagura looked genuinely repentant.%K%P
'Is your manager really that scary?'%K%P
'Probably not. It's getting her pay deducted\nthat Kagura's afraid of.'%K%P
Losing a chunk of her salary would have\na serious effect on Kagura's daily life.\nWe shouldn't joke about it.%K%P
'Yamato, about what you told us earlier...'%K%P
'Oh, you mean about how the video bombed?'%K%P
I'd already told both of them about the\ndisappointing response. The reason we were meeting\nup now was to discuss what we could do about it.%K%P
'I know how you feel, but I think this isn't bad,\nfor now at least.'%K%P
'Yeah, I agree. We've only just teamed up,\nwe'll still need some time to get better.'%K%P
'Yeah, maybe all we can do is upload\na few more videos to try to show your progress...'%K%P
'Actually, I do have one piece\nof good news to report.'%K%P
'My stage clothes should be done\nthe day after tomorrow.'%K%P
'Wow, already? Tatsumi's sure works fast!'%K%P
'Ha ha, quit it, I'm blushing...'%K%P
'I think she meant your store,\nnot you.'%K%P
'Yeah, I know...'%K%P
'If we need more content,\nhow about a post announcing my new outfit?'%K%P
'Great idea! That'll mean you won't have to practice\nin your uniform anymore, too.' %K%P
Some may say there's nothing wrong\nwith a school uniform, but uniforms don't exactly\nscream 'Divine Idol'.%K%P
Even a few comments had complained that the\ngirls didn't have proper outfits. I couldn't deny\na stage outfit was what the fans wanted.%K%P
'Sure, let's give that a try and see what happens.'%K%P
'Of course, we'll continue our rehearsals, too. \nWe're still lacking a sense of unity.'%K%P
I guess we can't keep making it up as we go. \nWe'd end up in trouble if we didn't put together\na good performance pretty soon.%K%P
